apiHolder

Class ApiHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • apiHolder.ApiHolder

  • public class ApiHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    ishay the ApiHolder class holds all the APIs in static class. we assume that there is only 0 or 1 instance of this class. this class holds: 1. LanguageServiceClient google syntax analyzer client. 2. MongoClient connector + collection getter 3. Scanner for user input (to be deleted) 4. TextRazor for contextual meaning analyze. 5. JLanguageTool for spelling corrections 6. PrintStream logger
